sentences.en: Disperse your troops! are they doing here, outside my castle?
sentences.cn: 赶走你地军队! 在偶地城堡外面,你这是干啥?

sentences.en: It emits unpleasant high - pitched wails that are intended to disperse crowds.
sentences.cn: 这种设备可以发射出令人不悦的高频悲叹声用来驱散人群.

sentences.en: It has good fluidity, high luster, good disperse, and high filling level.
sentences.cn: 具有流动性好 、 光泽度高 、 分散均匀 、 填充量高等特点.

sentences.en: Police moved in to disperse the crowd.
Police turned water - cannon on the rioters, ie to disperse them.
sentences.cn: 警察用高压水龙头对准闹事的人(驱散他们).

sentences.en: Police used tear gas to disperse the crowd.
sentences.cn: 警察用催泪瓦斯驱散人群。

sentences.en: Pour into running bath water and swirl to disperse.
sentences.cn: 倒入流动的洗浴水中搅拌至溶解.

sentences.en: radioactivePolice used tear gas to disperse the crowd.
sentences.cn: 警察用催泪瓦斯驱散人群。

sentences.en: Seven people were wounded when soldiers fired rubber bullets to disperse crowds.
sentences.cn: 士兵发射橡皮子弹驱散人群时有7个人受了伤。

sentences.en: The clouds dispersed as quickly as they had gathered.
The earth will in time vaporize with its material and disperse.
sentences.cn: 到那时,地球将与它上面的物体一起汽化而弥散.

sentences.en: The error and solution bringing from finite element disperse are expatiated.
sentences.cn: 阐述了有限元离散带来的误差和解决办法.

sentences.en: The intense currents disperse the sewage.
The police fire tear - gas shells in an attempt to disperse the crowd.
sentences.cn: 警察施放催泪弹企图驱散人群.

sentences.en: To dye the polyester stretch fabric with disperse dye by thermosol process.
sentences.cn: 该文就热熔温度对涤纶弹性带弹性的影响及防泳移剂的用量做一讨论.

sentences.en: Two policemen came up and told them to disperse at once.
sentences.cn: 两个警察跑过来,叫他们立即散开.

sentences.en: When the boss falls from power , his lackeys disperse.

words.tran_cn: 散布的；被分散的；被驱散的
分散；传播；散布；疏散；消失
散布；[统计][数] 离差；驱散

phrases.tran_cn: 分散体系；分散系统；分散物系

trans.tran_en: if a group of people disperse or are dispersed, they go away in different directions

trans.tran_cn: 分散， 赶散； 消散， 驱散
